mds-cashbook-account
====================
Tryton module to add accounts to cashbook.

Install
=======

pip install mds-cashbook-account

Requires
========
- Tryton 7.0

Changes
=======

*7.0.14 - 01.12.2023*

- add: allow update of cashbook-part of move-lines

*7.0.13 - 01.12.2023*

- compatibility to Tryton 7.0
